spatial_accuracy.notes: The 3D render fails to replicate the L-shaped central hallway and open-plan lounge/dining area. Room placement is significantly altered with arbitrary wall insertions.

structural_fidelity.notes: The detached garage and balcony are missing entirely. Adjacency between the kitchen and laundry is ignored, and the WC is merged or relocated. Many wall partitions are hallucinated.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture such as dining tables and beds are placed randomly in rooms that do not correspond to the functions intended by the 2D plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The model has clean geometry and consistent lighting, though the camera lacks a true orthographic projection and some interior walls appear semitransparent.

detected_errors.description: Missing detached garage and balcony area.
Kitchen and entry area layouts do not match the staggered wall configuration of the floor plan.
Hallucinated interior partitions and extra rooms not present in the original design.
Incorrect proportions of the central living space, which is fragmented in the render.
Wall transparency and ghosting artifacts on the left-hand side of the render.
